sentence.Network_en: The whole immoral conducts almost is wear vainglory around but living.
sentence.Network_cn: 一切恶行几乎都是围绕着虚荣而生的.

sentence.Network_en: And yet there are lots of reasons to see it as vainglory.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是仍有很多原因证明这只是噱头而已.

sentence.Network_en: Discreet practice eliminates vainglory; ascribing our right actions to God removes pride.
sentence.Network_cn: 谨言慎行可以去除虚荣; 将我们正确的行为归于上帝可以去除骄傲.

PerfectNetExp.abs: vagusstoff 迷走神经素vainglory 自负VAKT 多感官教学法
灵修经验 ... sadness 伤悲 Vainglory 虚荣 Pride 骄傲.
英语... ... 虚荣心1. vanity;vainglory;false pride 讲排场1. to go in for pomp;to display riches;to hanker after vainglory.

list.abs: for example , fasts and vigils , prayer and psalmody , almsgiving and hospitality are noble in themselves , but when they are done out of vainglory they are no longer noble .禁食、守夜、祈祷、唱诵圣歌、布施、款待客人…等，都是高贵的行为，然而，如果这些美德是出于虚荣心，就一点价值也没有了。

once upon a time Wu Zhuang was a vainglorious girl . once she achieved the Tao , she gave up her demerit of coquettishness and paid no attention to her appearance anymore .从前无庄是一位爱慕虚荣的女子，一旦得道她就忘记了自己搔首弄姿的老毛病，不再那么重视外表。
She is a vainglorious woman ., 她是个爱虚荣的女性.
the grand and vainglorious forces running The Great American Scandal Machine are big on how things seem .使“美国巨型丑闻制造机”运转的宏大而又虚荣的力量，对事情看起来是什么情况影响很大。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: suggested by Old French vaine gloire, Latin vana gloria

auth_sentence.content: He was embarrassed, perfectly devoid of vainglory.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was embarrassed, perfectly devoid of vainglory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was embarrassed, perfectly devoid of vainglory.

auth_sentence.content: His apprehensions of disaster brought on by overreaching and vainglory.
auth_sentence.res_content: His apprehensions of disaster brought on by overreaching and vainglory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His apprehensions of disaster brought on by overreaching and vainglory.

auth_sentence.content: Vainglory, somewhat literary, implies an inordinate and therefore empty or unjustified pride: puffed up by vainglory.
auth_sentence.res_content: Vainglory, somewhat literary, implies an inordinate and therefore empty or unjustified pride: puffed up by vainglory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Vainglory, somewhat literary, implies an inordinate and therefore empty or unjustified pride: puffed up by vainglory.
